post.text: Millions of Americans work hard and pay their taxes. So why doesn't Donald Trump pay his?

comment.author: Mary
comment.text: He says he is intelligent, I think what he has done is tax evasion and that is paid with jail

replies.author: Jacob
replies.text: Ignorant. Learn the difference between tax evasion and tax avoidance through legal means with the law. Wesley snipe evaded taxes
